segments.text: This whole situation is making me incredibly anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing sink is bad enough, all that water on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just a matter of time before someone slips and falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And then there's that precarious stool the boy is standing on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like it could topple over at any second, its legs are splayed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could really hurt himself, and the girl is standing so close too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of broken dishes, a twisted ankle, or a head injury is sickening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the waste of water, just running and running, is quite frankly appalling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a messy, dangerous predicament this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s hard to watch knowing what could happen next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The lack of control in this kitchen is just terrible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could reach in and turn off that faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene feels like a catastrophe waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It gives me a knot in my stomach just thinking about the outcome.
segments.speaker: PAR
